name: Create closed customer lead for Direct Sales i.e. 99978 staff member with todays date and Direct Sales as the Contact Method

testSteps.description: Given I logged into the API earlier
And I have confirmed a Customer with a cif Key "0100000933079696000"

When I create a lead for a customer with values:
| cifKey | directBankingDiallerFlag | contactStaffID | interestedInProduct | contactMethod | immediateClose | noteText | cifNotepadFormat |
| 0100000933079696000 | false | 99978 | Regular Savings | Direct Sales | true | Another Test Note | IntrestedIn+Method+Note |

children.description: Create lead capture: | cifKey | directBankingDiallerFlag | contactStaffID | interestedInProduct | contactMethod | immediateClose | noteText | cifNotepadFormat | | 0100000933079696000 | false | 99978 | Regular Savings | Direct Sales | true | Another Test Note | IntrestedIn+Method+Note |

testSteps.description: Then I should receive back a successful response

title: Create closed customer lead for Direct Sales i.e. 99978 staff member with todays date and Direct Sales as the Contact Method
